operations.summary: Returns all of the organizations in the specifed format
operations.description: Returns an array of organizations in either JSON or xml depending on the specified format

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: If you want xml you will need to specify it in a parameter. The response defaults to JSON

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

operations.summary: Returns the datasets that belong to the organization in specified format
operations.description: When you specify the organization you are interested in it will return an array of datasets that belong to the organization. The datasets will be in JSON or xml depending on specified format.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization you are interested in.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: If you want xml you will need to specify it in a parameter. The response defaults to JSON

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

operations.summary: Returns the countries that belong to the organization and dataset in specified format
operations.description: When you specify the organization and dataset you are interested in it will return an array of countries that belong to the organization and dataset. The countries will be in JSON or xml depending on the specified format.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization you are interested in.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: The dataset you are interested in.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: If you want xml you will need to specify it in a parameter. The response defaults to JSON

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

operations.summary: Returns the datasets that belong to the organization and country in specified format
operations.description: When you specify the organization and country you are interested in it will return an array of datasets that belong to the organization and country. The datasets will be in JSON or xml depending on the specified format.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization you are interested in.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country you are interested in.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: If you want xml you will need to specify it in a parameter. The response defaults to JSON

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key

operations.summary: Returns the records that belong to the organization, dataset, and country specified in the specified format
operations.description: When you specify the organization, dataset, country you are interested in it will return an array of records that belong to the organization, dataset, and country. The records will be in JSON or xml depending on the specified format.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization you are interested in.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: The dataset you are interested in.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country you are interested in.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: If you want xml you will need to specify it in a parameter. The response defaults to JSON

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: Your access application id

parameters.name: app_key
parameters.description: Your access application key
